Job Title: Application Development Co-op Employment Type: Paid Co-op Location: North Vancouver Hours of Work: 7.5 hr Day Shift (5 days M-F) (8 days per month or 2 days per week in office) Pay: $34.23 per hour + 11.2% in lieu of vacation and stat Duration: 4 months with options to renew Position Highlights Working as a member of ICBC's Software Development Lifecycle team, you will be developing and managing solutions used by our Insurance, Claims, or Driver Licensing lines of business. You will work with industry-leading technologies, including SAP, Guidewire's suite and other Java-based platforms and be part of a talented, diverse and inclusive team in an environment that promotes growth and development.
